title: Error message when installing league.
body:
My friend is trying to install league on his new computer and gets this error. The message occurs as he tries to set league up as an application. 

*Edit he says it is error 1935

messagemicrosoft.vcad.crt.type="win32".version="8.0.50727.4053".publicKeyToken="1fc8b3b9a1e18e3b"processorArchitecture="amd64'".

Can i get any help with this?

replies.body:
I can certainly help with this! The install error 1935 is typically due to corrupt pre-requisite software on the PC that League relies on to install properly. The common solution is to [uninstall](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/instantanswers/ce7ba88b-4e95-4354-b807-35732db36c4d/repair-or-remove-programs) all current versions of Microsoft Visual C++ 2005, then restart your PC. [Run windows update](http://www.update.microsoft.com/) to ensure you have all available updates installed, then reinstall C++ 2005 from [this link.](http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=3387)

Let me know if this helped your friend out. :)
Thanks! We fixed it late last night by downloading league from an alternative link that a youtuber gave to save the problem. However, we will keep this in mind if the problem ever occurs again.
